column4: i'm trying to convince a school to switch to linux their biggest argument is that the rest of the marketplace uses ms products how do you guys think i can deal with tis?
set up a test machine with edubuntu, show them what it does, let the kids try it out
my mum's classroom has 1 xp machine (supported) and 3 ubuntu machines and a suse machine - the kids all use the linux one cos it has more games :)
